Game Base.descricao: A powerful crushing device that harnesses rocket technology to increase smashing force.
Game Base.moddesc: Charge Melee Attacks increase the speed of all Melee Attacks by 10% for 5s.

Game Base.descricao: Lightweight. Silent. Deadly. It's rumored that the blade is meant to bestow a slow, agonizing death.
Game Base.moddesc: Damage increases by +25% against BLEEDING enemies, and +25% when attacking from behind. Charge Attacks deal 100 BLEEDING damage over 10s

Game Base.descricao: Molecules to atoms, atoms to protons, protons to quarks--down and down into the fundamental quanticles of the universe. The deeper one goes, the more one understands how much one does not understand.
Game Base.moddesc: On Neutral Evade Attacks Atom Splitter achieves Nuclear Fission, releasing a wave of charged particles which deals 151.5 Damage to targets within 10m. Charged Neutral Evade Attacks increase range by 3x and Damage by 25%

Game Base.descricao: There is an ethereal lightness to this weapon, as though it were made of paper or breath. Though it strikes its foes forcibly enough.
Game Base.moddesc: After dealing 250 damage, Charge Attack will release a Dreamwave, flowing outwards 20m and returning to caster. Dreamwave applies SLOW to all enemies for 10s and grants a Stack of REVERIE for each enemy affected. Each Stack grants +2% to All Damage and +2% Movement Speed, which lasts 15s.

Game Base.descricao: A pair of gauntlets with sharp crystal blades that strike with vicious speed and velocity.
Game Base.moddesc: Dealing Melee Damage 6 times over 10s empowers Feral Judgement. When empowered, Neutral Backdash Charge Attacks apply Death Sentence. After 1.5s of being sentenced, the enemy will suffer 10 Phantom Strikes, dealing X25 Damage each. Deals 25% additional damage to BLEEDING enemies.

Game Base.descricao: An expertly balanced blade that is the product of advanced Fae metallurgy.
Game Base.moddesc: Charge Attacks taint the blood of targets, causing all attacks from Godsplitter to register as Weakspot hits for 3s seconds. Duration increases with additional fragments. Max 35s.

Game Base.descricao: An ancient, quick, and versatile blade suited for many situations. Charge attacks cast a projectile for dealing melee damage at range.
Game Base.moddesc: Charge attacks use 35 stamina to release an energy wave projectile allowing the wielder to strike enemies from much farther away.

Game Base.descricao: Melee charged attacks apply CORROSION, dealing 100 ACID damage over 5s.
Game Base.moddesc: Charge attacks use 25 stamina to throw the spear, which returns to the wielder's hand.

Game Base.descricao: Fast striking claws with a high Critical Hit Chance. Neutral Dodge grants the power  of Lifesteal.
Game Base.moddesc: Neutral Evade turns to mist, granting Nightshade 5% base damage as Lifesteal for 5s. Perfect Dodge doubles duration.

Game Base.descricao: A magical stave rumored to contain a healing spirit within. Strikes with wide swings.
Game Base.moddesc: After dealing 250 damage, the next charge attack causes the spirit of the RED DOE to stampede forward, dealing 160 damage to enemies and regenerating 10% Health to allies in its path.

Game Base.descricao: A super-heated laser sword with an infinitely sharp edge. Perfect for cutting... anything.
Game Base.moddesc: Neutral Backdash Charge creates a Whirlwind of slashes which strike all enemies within 8m for 75 damage.

Game Base.descricao: A massive Greatsword which contains the harnessed magic of a corrupted Guardian. Can summon small shockwaves.
Game Base.moddesc: Charge to fire off ground-based shockwaves which deal 115 damage. Costs 35 Stamina

Game Base.descricao: Dealing damage unleashes the dormant Toxic Gas within the head. When infused, Basic Attacks apply CORRODED for 5s.
Game Base.moddesc: When infused, Neural Backdash Charge Attack explodes in a 3m. AOE and leaves an ACID Cloud which last for 15s.

Game Base.descricao: A scorched blade imbued with FIRE.
Game Base.moddesc: Charge Melee Attacks apply BURNING which deals 200 FIRE damage over 5s

Game Base.descricao: A glowing Greatsword forged from shards of a shattered Worldstone. Charge attacks cast waves.
Game Base.moddesc: Charge Attacks release a wide horizontal projectile that penetrates through multiple enemies dealing 116 damage.

The Awakened King.descricao: A hammer-like anchor that swings with an exceptionally irregular ferocity.
The Awakened King.moddesc: Charged Melee Hits grant Fathomless Deep which increases Melee Staggern by 10% per stack for 5s. Max 3 attacks.

The Awakened King.descricao: An evil-fueled reaping tool that deals additional damage to suffering targets
The Awakened King.moddesc: Increases Melee Damage by 10% if the target is suffering from a Negative Status Effect.

The Awakened King.descricao: A massive hammer infused with the souls of deceased Dran. Its dormant power can be awakened by taking damage.
The Awakened King.moddesc: Incoming damage grants Awakening which increases Melee Damage by 5% per stack for 10s. Max 10 stacks.

The Forgotten Kingdom.descricao: The staff hums with energy. A destructive power within yearns to be released.
The Forgotten Kingdom.moddesc: Charged Melee empowers the staff for 10s, causing melee attacks to launch an energy bolt that seeks enemies within 30m, dealing 50 SHOCK Damage and grants 1 stack of POWER STONE. Max 10 stacks. While empowered, Charged Melee calls a 6m shockwave dealing 75 SHOCK damage and ends POWER STONE. For each POWER STONE stack built when ended, release 1 energy bolt that seeks a random enemy and applies OVERLOAD for 10s

The Forgotten Kingdom.descricao: The mace whirs as if living harmonics hold its shape. When swung. a breath of sand tethers to the rock crown for extended reach and lethal momentum.
The Forgotten Kingdom.moddesc: Maintaining an overhead Charged Melee forms a 5m cyclone, dealing 35 damage per second and pulls enemies forward the wielder. Each Cyclone hit applies EXPOSED for 3s. Max 15s. EXPOSED: Target receives 15% additional damage from all sources

The Dark Horizon.descricao: A massive weapon of pure destruction. Attacks can be enhanced by Charging at the cost of Stamina over time. Increases Encumbrance by 15.
The Dark Horizon.moddesc: Charged Attacks become INDOMITABLE INDOMITABLE: Grants 15% Damage Reduction, converts all damage taken to Grey Health, and prevents wielder from being staggered. Charging increases maximum damage by up to 350%

The Dark Horizon.descricao: The gauntlets harness the power of a neutron star and a black hole. When merged, cosmic forces are unleashed.
The Dark Horizon.moddesc: Charged Melee empowers the Gauntlets for 15s, increases Standard Melee Damage by 25% and causing Charged Melee Attacks to release 8m penetrating blasts. Each blast reduces the duration. While empowered, performing a Charged Melee Attack during a Neutral Backdash gathers power for up to 5s, then fires a DARKNESS BEAM that deals 125 Melee Damage every 0.5s. The beam duration equals its time charge, then ends Kilonova after firing

The Dark Horizon.descricao: Harvester automaton limb fitted with a plasma torch. The system breach of a Drzyr phantom initiated jettisoned protocols, trapping strange properties within the makeshift weapon.
The Dark Horizon.moddesc: Charged melee attacks release a Phantom that trails behind the host weapon, dealing 35% of the Harvester Scythe's damage. Each hit of the Phantom Blade increases Melee Attack Speed and Melee Charge Speed by 6% for 5s. Max 5 stacks.
